lead_paragraph: “We’ve had enough debates,” Mr. Trump said on Friday. Those looking to halt his march toward the Republican nomination had other ideas.

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Palm Beach, and Maggie Haberman from New York. Reporting was contributed by Mark Landler from Washington, Matt Flegenheimer from Orlando, Fla., Nicholas Confessore from Miami Beach, and Thomas Kaplan from Moraine, Ohio.
byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Trump Urges Party to Unite Behind Him, but Resistance Remains on His Policies
headline.main: Donald Trump Urges Party to Unite, but Resistance Remains

snippet: “We’ve had enough debates,” Mr. Trump said on Friday. Those looking to halt his march toward the Republican nomination had other ideas.
abstract: Donald J Trump receives endorsement from former rival Ben Carson and calls on Republican Party to united behind his candidacy; many of Trump's policy proposals continue to give many in party pause.
